mapper.sql: BUSID, DAY_STR, PAY_TYPE, IS_CLO_INVOICE, PAY_AMOUNT, BUS_PLATFORM, BUS_NUM, AGENT_ID, AG_UNIQ_NUM, BUS_PARENT_ID, BUS_PARENT_BUS_NUM, BUS_PARENT_AGENT_ID, C_DATE, STATUS
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from O_CASH_SUMMARY_MOUTH
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into O_CASH_SUMMARY_MOUTH (BUSID, DAY_STR, PAY_TYPE, IS_CLO_INVOICE, PAY_AMOUNT, BUS_PLATFORM, BUS_NUM, AGENT_ID, AG_UNIQ_NUM, BUS_PARENT_ID, BUS_PARENT_BUS_NUM, BUS_PARENT_AGENT_ID, C_DATE, STATUS) values (#{busid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dayStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isCloInvoice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{busPlatform,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{busNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agUniqNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{busParentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{busParentBusNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{busParentAgentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

insert into O_CASH_SUMMARY_MOUTH
BUSID,
DAY_STR,
PAY_TYPE,
IS_CLO_INVOICE,
PAY_AMOUNT,
BUS_PLATFORM,
BUS_NUM,
AGENT_ID,
AG_UNIQ_NUM,
BUS_PARENT_ID,
BUS_PARENT_BUS_NUM,
BUS_PARENT_AGENT_ID,
C_DATE,
STATUS,
#{busid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dayStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{payType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{isCloInvoice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{payAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{busPlatform,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{busNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{agentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{agUniqNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{busParentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{busParentBusNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{busParentAgentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{cDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
mapper.update:
update O_CASH_SUMMARY_MOUTH
PAY_AMOUNT = #{payAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BUS_PLATFORM = #{busPlatform,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUS_NUM = #{busNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AGENT_ID = #{agentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AG_UNIQ_NUM = #{agUniqNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUS_PARENT_ID = #{busParentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUS_PARENT_BUS_NUM = #{busParentBusNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUS_PARENT_AGENT_ID = #{busParentAgentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_DATE = #{cDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where BUSID = #{busid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DAY_STR = #{dayStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and PAY_TYPE = #{payType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and IS_CLO_INVOICE = #{isCloInvoice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

sql.if: select * from ( select row_.*, rownum rownum_ from (

mapper.select: select sum(pay_amount) as PAY_AMOUNT, BUSID, DAY_STR, PAY_TYPE, BUS_PLATFORM, BUS_NUM, IS_CLO_INVOICE, AGENT_ID, AG_UNIQ_NUM, BUS_PARENT_ID, BUS_PARENT_BUS_NUM, BUS_PARENT_AGENT_ID, sysdate, 1 from ( --付款单现付金额 不开发票 select sum(a.real_amount) as pay_amount,'YHHK' as pay_type,to_char(max(a.real_rec_time),'yyyy-MM') as day_str, e.agent_id,d.ag_uniq_num,e.bus_num,e.bus_platform,e.id as busid,${is_clo_invoice} as is_clo_invoice, h.id as bus_parent_id,h.bus_num as bus_parent_bus_num,h.agent_id as bus_parent_agent_id from o_Cash_Receivables a left join o_payment b on b.id = a.src_id and a.cashpay_type = 'PAYMENT' left join o_order c on c.id=b.order_id left join a_agent d on d.id=c.agent_id left join a_agent_businfo e on e.id = c.bus_id left join a_agent_businfo h on h.bus_parent = e.id where a.pay_status = '4' --结清状态 and a.review_status='3' --审核通过状态 and b.is_clo_invoice=#{is_clo_invoice} --是否开发票 and c.review_status = '3' and a.pay_type='YHHK' --线下打款 and a.cashpay_type = 'PAYMENT' --付款单现付金额 and a.real_rec_time is not null --实际到账时间不为空 and e.bus_num is not null --业务编号不为空 and to_char(a.real_rec_time,'yyyy-MM') = #{date_str} and a.status=1 and b.status=1 and c.status=1 and d.status=1 group by e.agent_id,d.ag_uniq_num,e.bus_num,e.bus_platform,e.id,h.id ,h.bus_num ,h.agent_id union select sum(a.real_amount) as pay_amount,'YHHK'as pay_type,to_char(max(a.real_rec_time),'yyyy-MM') as day_str, f.agent_id,e.ag_uniq_num,f.bus_num,f.bus_platform,f.id as busid,${is_clo_invoice} as is_clo_invoice, h.id as bus_parent_id,h.bus_num as bus_parent_bus_num,h.agent_id as bus_parent_agent_id from o_Cash_Receivables a left join o_Supplement b on a.src_id = b.id and b.pay_method=1 and b.pk_type=1 and b.status=1 --pay_method=1线下打款 pk_type=1分期补款 left join o_payment_detail c on c.src_id = b.id and c.status=1 left join o_payment d on d.id = c.payment_id and d.status=1 left join o_order g on g.id = d.order_id left join a_agent e on e.id = d.agent_id left join a_agent_businfo f on f.id= g.bus_id left join a_agent_businfo h on h.bus_parent = f.id where a.pay_status = '4' --结清状态 and a.review_status='3' --审核通过状态 and a.pay_type='YHHK' --线下打款 and a.cashpay_type = 'SUPPLEMENT' --付款单现付金额 and c.src_type = 'XXBK' -- 线下补款 and d.is_clo_invoice=#{is_clo_invoice} and g.review_status = '3' -- 订单审批通过 and to_char(a.real_rec_time,'yyyy-MM') = #{date_str} and g.status=1 and d.status=1 and c.status=1 and b.status=1 and a.status=1 group by f.agent_id,e.ag_uniq_num,f.bus_num,f.bus_platform,f.id,h.id ,h.bus_num ,h.agent_id ) i group by pay_type, day_str, agent_id, ag_uniq_num, bus_num, bus_platform, busid, is_clo_invoice, bus_parent_id, bus_parent_bus_num, bus_parent_agent_id
